DOC.brief_summary: This two part study . Part A study evaluate metabolite GSK221149 follow single repeat oral dosing also assess pharmacokinetics GSK221149 administer potent CYP3A4 inhibitor Ketoconazole . Part B study look pharmacokinetics GSK221149 follow high fat meal .
DOC.brief_title: A Two Cohort Study Look Metabolites GSK221149 , Metabolism GSK221149 Administered With High Fat Meal With Ketoconazole
